page.title: 06TOURISM
page.content: { THE GOTH}IS A PUB WITH A LOUNGE IN WHICH PARTIES ARE HELD.THERE IS ALSO A SLIGHTLY LEANING TOWER WHICH HAS A CLOCK ON TOP OF IT. AT THE CROSS THERE IS A{MONUMENT}IN MEMORY OF{MRS.KERR}WHO DIED SAVING A YOUNG CHILD FROM AN ONCOMING CAR AT THE BEGINNING OF THIS CENTURY.THIS MONUMENT IS SHAPED LIKE AN OLD LAMP POST. {THE WAR MOMORIAL}IS IN MEMORY OF ALL THE MEN FROM THIS AREA WHO DIED IN WORLD WAR ONE AND TWO.IT HAS ALL THE NAMES OF THE SLAIN ON A PLAQUE.THIS CAN BE FOUND ABOUT 200M SOUTH FROM THE CROSS. {WOOD PARK}WAS DONATED BY MR.WOOD WHO ONCE OWNED ALL OF THE LAND AROUND BATHVILLE.THE PARK WAS TO BE USED ONCE A YEAR BY THE CHILDREN OF ARMADALE.
